component.name: Rectifex
component.summary: A quantitative screener for the relative valuation of global stocks

description.p: Aethelon is a tool for relative stock analysis. It does not calculate a "fair value" but answers the question: "Which companies, compared to all others in the analysis universe, are currently the most attractive based on my chosen strategy?"

The app analyzes a universe of nearly 200 global companies across 6 fundamental dimensions (Quality, Value, Growth, Momentum, Dividend, Safety) and allows the user to sort the results based on predefined investment styles.
Important Note: The analysis is purely quantitative and does not account for qualitative, forward-looking risks such as disruptive technological changes.
